name: SolVillains
description: Solvillains are a collection of 2244 NFTs on the Solana Blockchain. Our mission is to make a community driven comic book series. A community of misfits and a shared love for the comic world. There will be biweekly issues of Solvillain Comics where the holders influence the story through staking mechanics and Voting (More on this in the Litepaper). Staking will also include upgrading to SolSupervillain, burning and rewards depending on the outcome of each comic.
